Description copied from interface: VehicleImageDao
This method communicates with the UCM server and queries it to retrieve content items' details.

Specified by:
findImages in interface VehicleImageDao
Parameters:
query - String that represents a query to the UCM server

providerName - The content provider name
serverGroup - The Group object that contains one or more server details
Returns:
List A collection of VehicleImage objects created based on the server's response to the query

                                  com.manheim.vim.schemas.config.vim.Group serverGroup)
Description copied from interface: VehicleImageDao
This method communicates with the UCM server, finds the content by its Id. If a match is found, returns its binary data as a byte array
